Wagner Labor ArchiveElmer Holmes Bobst Library70 Washington Square South10th FloorNew York, NY 10012(212) 998-2630tamiment.wagner@nyu.eduThis finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2018-07-30T20:25:01Describing Archives: A Content Standard
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Naomi Allen Papers on the Transport Workers Union of America, Local 100
Allen, Naomi
Allen, Naomi
WAG.295
4 Linear Feet (4 boxes)
undated
Scope and Contents
Records contain materials relating to Naomi Allen's involvement with the Local 100 of the Transport Workers Union of America in the 1990s.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Naomi Allen, 2008. The accession number associated with this gift is 1985.005.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by Naomi Allen was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Naomi Allen Paper on the Transport Workers Union of America, Local 100; WAG 295; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Transport Workers Union of America. Local 100 Allen, Naomi
